entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Windy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
